00029 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00033 
00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetHeaderReaderTest );
00035 
00036 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::setUp()
00037 {
00038   Fs::aptOpen(is, TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::tearDown()
00042 {
00043         is.close();
00044         fh.Clear();
00045 }

00047 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::CreationTest()
00048 {
00049         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadOneDataSetHeaderTest()
00054 {
00055         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00056         fhReader.Read();
00057 
00058         DataGroupHeader dch;
00059         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00060         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00061 
00062         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00063         DataSetHeader dph;
00064         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00065         u_int32_t nextDataSet = 0;
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(nextDataSet = dphReader.Read(is, dph));
00067 
00068         // Check the DataSetHeader information was read
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetName() == L"acquired data");
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowCnt() == 100);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00077 
00078         // Check the data dataSet name value pairs
00079         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00080         dph.GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00084         ++nvpBegin;
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00088         ++nvpBegin;
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadMinimumInfoForOneDataSetHeaderTest()
00093 {
00094         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00095         fhReader.Read();
00096 
00097         DataGroupHeader dch;
00098         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00099         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00100 
00101         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00102         DataSetHeader dph;
00103         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00104         u_int32_t nextDataSet = 0;
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(nextDataSet = dphReader.ReadMinimumInfo(is, dph));
00106 
00107         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetName() == L"acquired data");
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowSize() == 0);
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataSize() == 0);
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowCnt() == 0);
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllTest()
00119 {
00120         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00121         fhReader.Read();
00122 
00123         DataGroupHeader dch;
00124         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00125         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00126 
00127         int32_t dpCount = 1; // fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt(); is not ready at this time
00128 
00129         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00130         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dphReader.ReadAll(is, dch, dpCount));
00132 
00133         // Check that the right number of DataSets were read
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00135 
00136         // Check the DataSetHeader information was read
00137         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00148 
00149         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00150         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00151         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00155         ++nvpBegin;
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00159         ++nvpBegin;
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00161 
00162         // Check the data dataSet columns
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetName() == L"Pixel");
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00166 
00167         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00168         ++dphBegin;
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllMinimumInfoTest()
00173 {
00174         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00175         fhReader.Read();
00176 
00177         DataGroupHeader dch;
00178         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00179         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00180 
00181         int32_t dpCount = 1; // fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt(); is not ready at this time
00182 
00183         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00184         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dphReader.ReadAllMinimumInfo(is, dch, dpCount));
00186 
00187         // Check that the right number of DataSets were read
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00189 
00190         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00191         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00201 
00202         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00203         ++dphBegin;
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00205 }
